dcterms:description: The ArgKP-2021 dataset contains arguments on 28 controversial topics, categorized by stance, with each argument annotated as <argument, key point, label>, where the label indicates whether the argument matches the key point or not.
dcterms:title: ArgKP-2021

dcterms:description: MIRACL is a multilingual retrieval dataset covering 18 diverse languages, designed to facilitate research in multilingual information retrieval.
dcterms:title: MIRACL
